description: A perfect treat for chilly mornings, these baked apples are filled with a delicious cinnamon, oat and raisin filling. Make it in three easy steps.
keywords: Cooked fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Sesame free,High fibre,Soy free,Apple,Autumn,Apr 2021
name: Classic Baked Apples Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 Kanzi apples, cored, scored around the circumference at the widest part

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Mix oats, 1/2 cup sugar, cinnamon, raisins and butter in a small bowl. Arrange apples in a medium baking dish and spoon oat mixture inside apples, pushing down gently.
Mix cornflour with 3/4 cup water in a small jug. Add remaining sugar and stir until combined. Pour into baking dish around apples. Cover dish with foil and bake for 20 minutes.
Remove foil and bake for a further 15 minutes or until apples have softened and caramel has thickened. Drizzle apples with caramel and serve with ice-cream.
